channel.title: Need a brush
channel.description: Hello...I googled around, but I haven't been able to find a brush I need. Supposedly it's called "paper brush tool and grunge tool", according to [url=http://belovedghost.deviantart.com/art/ms-bg-new-83131499]this guy[/url]. So if anyone has it/knows where to find it, please post.

item.title: Need a brush
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

he made it in photoshop with a paper brush tool which created the paper and a grunge tool which created the old looking part…

Read full topic
